name: From Jura to Java

ingredients.item: Isle of Jura Superstition single-malt scotch

preparation:
Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice, and stir until properly diluted.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with 1 large ice cube.
Express the oil from a lemon peel over top.
Garnish with a black garlic financier (or other garnish of choice) on a curved pick.
